trans-unit.source: Represents a hidden field used to store a non-displayed value.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來儲存非顯示值的隱藏欄位。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is used to store a value that needs to be persisted across posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項用來儲存需要保存在張貼至伺服器的值。

trans-unit.source: It is rendered as an `<input type= "hidden"/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 它會轉譯為`<input type= "hidden"/>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Normally view state, session state, and cookies are used to maintain the state of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 一般檢視狀態、 工作階段狀態，以及 cookie 可用來維護 Web Form 網頁的狀態。

trans-unit.source: However, if these methods are disabled or are not available, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control to store state values.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果這些方法會停用或無法使用，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項來儲存狀態的值。

trans-unit.source: To specify the value for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can provide a routine that gets called every time the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control changes between posts to the server by creating an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供每次呼叫常式的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制發佈至伺服器所建立的事件處理常式之間的變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control to store the value of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項加入儲存的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>張貼至伺服器之間的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The examples have a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 範例有一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅的文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> object used to indicate that child controls are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> 物件，用來表示不允許子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is normally used to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> object for storing the child controls of a Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateControlCollection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法通常用來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>儲存 Web 伺服器控制項的子控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation of the method, an <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection is always returned to indicate that child controls are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中的方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>一律會傳回集合，表示不允許子控制項。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control, you can override this method to support child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" />控制項，您可以覆寫此方法以支援子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出佈景主題是否套用至此控制項。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" /> to indicate that this control does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回 <see langword="false" />，表示這個控制項不支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項不支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 已覆寫這個屬性永遠傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定這個屬性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to this control.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項設定輸入焦點。

trans-unit.source: Setting focus to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 將焦點設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項不支援。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown if you attempt to call this method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果您想要呼叫這個方法會擲回。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> 控制項的回傳資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳的結果改變了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> 控制項的狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The Web Forms page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` to this method call, then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> on those controls.
trans-unit.target: Web Form 網頁架構會追蹤所有傳回的伺服器控制項`true`方法呼叫，再叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>那些控制項上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>就會引發事件時的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制發佈至伺服器之間的變更。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.OnValueChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.OnValueChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> 控制項的狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> class to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法是 helper 方法所使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>類別通知 ASP.NET 應用程式的狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以變更時引發事件回傳至伺服器的衍生類別中被覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，用來在用戶端的瀏覽器上呈現伺服器控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，向用戶端瀏覽器呈現 Web 伺服器控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Render%2A> method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Render%2A>方法用來呈現伺服器控制項內容，以使用指定的用戶端瀏覽器<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control, you can override this method to render custom content for the control.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" />控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法，以呈現控制項的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至控制項的面板。

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty string ("") to indicate that themes are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回空字串 ("")，表示不支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項不支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 已覆寫這個屬性永遠會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定這個屬性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的描述，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器控制項的狀態因回傳而變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的描述，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定隱藏欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> property to specify or determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A>屬性來指定，或判斷值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> property to specify the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A>屬性，以指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> 控制項的值在送至伺服器的公佈間變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>就會引發事件時的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制發佈至伺服器之間的變更。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged> event to display the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.ValueChanged>事件，以顯示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。
